publication.title: A novel service evolution approach for active services in ubiquitous computing
publication.authors: pengwei tian,yaoxue zhang,yue-zhi zhou,laurence tianruo yang,ming zhong,lin-kai weng
publication.abstract: SUMMARY With the emergence of more and more personalized service requirements, service customization has become a compelling problem in ubiquitous computing. As a new paradigm for service customization, the Active Services reuses existing services and obtains the user-needed service evolved from them. In this paper, a novel service reuse approach is proposed for service evolution process in the active services
